Job Description: Cerulean is looking for talented PHP Developers to add capability and capacity in PHP development. The candidate we seek should be flexible eager to learn and grow with the experienced team and other key developers. Candidate should be capable of working in a team, yet take responsibility and deliver. Contribute to existing development efforts and take initiative in development of new things.     Position  : Software Engineer/ Senior Software Engineer       Qualification  : Diploma in CS / BCA / BE / B.Tech / B.Sc / MCA / M.Sc / M.Tech        Preferred Skills  : Cake PHP/ Laravel        Good to have Skills  : Zend, Codeigniter, Hadoop, Joomla, Drupal, Ajax, WordPress, Smarty, MySQL, Javascript, HTML and more.       Responsibilities   : Includes but not limited to software development process, research, design, programming and testing.       Others  : Ability to initiate, troubleshoot. Communicate with clients. Hands on experience in PHP and Client Relationship Management.
